title: The Chateau country
creator_credit: Vavin and French Government Tourist Office
brief_description: A tour of the Renaissance castles of the Loire Valley. Rambouillet, summer residence of the French President; Blois, with its historical associations; Chateau Renault, court of the Valois and Orleans kings; Amboise with the chapel of St Hubert; Chinon, associated with Joan of Arc; and much more.
